```js
    <!DOCTYPE HTML>
    <html>
    <head>
    <!--[if lt IE 9]>
      <script src="img/html5shiv.js"></script>
    <![endif]-->
    <style>
    header{
      color:#ff0000;
      font-size:40px;
    }
    </style>
    </head>
    <body>
    <header>Hello HTML5!</header>
    </body>
    </html>
    ```

```js
    <!DOCTYPE HTML>
    <html>
    <head>
    <script src="img/modernizr.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <style>
    header{
      color:#ff0000;
      font-size:40px;
    }
    </style>
    </head>
    <body>
    <header>Hello HTML5!</header>
    </body>
    </html>
    ```
